message.subject: School Board Election
message.content:
M1.1. Steve:
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. Just wanted to let you know that Bill is running for an open position on the
Cy-Fair School Board.
[Inform: Bill is running for a position on the Cypress-Fairbanks school board]
M1.3. The election is Saturday May 6th at Emmott but early
voting takes place tomorrow from 8-12 at the instructional Support Building
on Jones Road.
[Inform: times and locations of election day and early voting]
M1.4. If you and Julie are planning on voting and are undecided, I
hope to solicit your support.
[Inform: Carol would like Steve's and Julie's support]
Sflink1.4
M1.5. His opponent is Don Ryan.
[Inform: Bill's opponent is Don Ryan]
M1.6. Carol
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: School Board Election
message.content:
M2.1. Of course we support Bill.
[Inform: Steve and Julie enthusiastically support Bill]
Blink1.4
M2.2. We'd be willing to put a sign in our yard.
[Inform: they would be willing to put a sign up in their yard]
M2.3. Steve
[Conventional: signature]
